requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              * What Step Up expects from you:
              
              • Do the real job
              
              • Have experience in running big budget
              
              • Know how to do research to understand about customers intensively
              
              • Good at facebook ads or google ads
              
              • Good at writing content marketing and landing page
              
              • Have creative thinking and being proactive in working
              

              *Why Step Up?
              
              - Attractive Salary: 10-20 million VND/month + KPIs Bonus
              
              - Social Insurance as per regulation
              
              - Free lunch
              
              - Have opportunity to express your abilities and live your passion
              
              - A very open, dynamic and friendly working environment with very cute & excellent colleagues and managers
              
              - Chances for balance between life and work with 5 working days per week
